title: Lesson 94
paragraph: This lesson focuses on complexity and subtlety, highlighting intricate, nuanced, and sophisticated qualities.

words.example: The design was intricate and beautiful.

words.meaning: characterized by subtle shades of meaning or expression
words.example: Her performance had a nuanced emotional depth.
The novel had a layered plot with many twists.

words.meaning: developed to a high degree of complexity; refined
words.example: The software has a sophisticated algorithm.

words.meaning: with impurities or unwanted elements removed; elegant and cultured
words.example: He had refined manners and a cultured style.

words.meaning: easily damaged or requiring careful handling; subtle and precise
involving many carefully arranged parts; detailed and complicated
words.example: They prepared an elaborate plan for the event.

words.meaning: having a complex surface or structure; rich in detail
words.example: The painting was textured and visually engaging.

words.meaning: open to more than one interpretation; unclear
words.example: The ending of the story was deliberately ambiguous.
